member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.LinkReader.Controllers.LinkReaderController
member.summary: Read URL links and return the results. Allows AI to browse on the Internet. Use this API with caution due to security risks.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.LinkReader.Controllers.LinkReaderController.ReadLink(System.String)
member.param: URL which points to the resource.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.

member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic
member.summary: Helps AI to auto-continue on the task.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.AutoContinue(System.String)
member.summary: Use when you can't provide an answer in one response and need to split the answer. Use after reply when user asks to generate answers with permission to continue. Continue with the next part of the reply after this function call return "Please continue".
member.returns: The output message to reply from the user.
member.param: Reserved. Send empty string as a value.
member.exception: Error message explaining why execution failed.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.GetWebPageContents(System.String)
member.summary: Use to retrieve content of websites by URL.
member.param: URL which points to the resource.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.StartProcess(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use to execute a process on user computer. Use `System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo`
member.param: Command-line arguments to use when starting the application.
The working directory for the process to be started. Default is empty string.
member.returns: The output of the started process.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing process requesys received via API due to security risks.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.RunPowerShellScript(System.String)
member.summary: Use to execute a PowerShell script on user computer.
member.param: The PowerShell script to be executed.
member.returns: The output of the executed PowerShell script.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing scripts received via API due to security risks.
